title: Simple machines
brief_description: At the heart of every modern mechanical device is a machine that’s been in use for thousands of years. This video introduces students to the simple machines: the lever, the inclined plane, the wedge, the screw, the pulley, and the wheel and axle. Animation and live action illustrate the principles behind their usefulness. Suitable for Mid-Upper Primary level students. Teacher’s Guide included.
